Mod3_Description: If {c_important}Leap{/c} doesn't damage any enemies, its Cooldown is reduced by {c_number}{SF_12}{/c} seconds.
Mod4_Description: If {c_important}Leap{/c} damages at least one enemy, gain {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} Fury.
Mod5_Description: Enemies damaged by {c_important}Leap{/c} are Slowed by {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:UPGRADEB_SLOW}{/c} seconds.
name: Leap
simple_desc: Brawling Skill: Leap forward and slam down with your weapon.
